Package org.cesecore.authorization.cache

Interface AccessTreeUpdateSessionLocal

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccessTreeUpdateSessionBean
    public interface AccessTreeUpdateSessionLocal
    Version:
    $Id: AccessTreeUpdateSessionLocal.java 25311 2017-02-21 19:07:00Z jeklund $

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addReloadEvent​(AuthorizationCacheReloadListener listener)
      Adds a method to be triggered when the authorization cache should be reloaded.
      int getAccessTreeUpdateNumber()
      Method returning the newest authorizationtreeupdatenumber.

      Method incrementing the authorization tree update number and thereby signaling to other beans that they should reconstruct their access trees.

    • Method Detail

      • signalForAccessTreeUpdate

        void signalForAccessTreeUpdate()
        Method incrementing the authorization tree update number and thereby signaling to other beans that they should reconstruct their access trees.

      • getAccessTreeUpdateNumber

        int getAccessTreeUpdateNumber()
        Method returning the newest authorizationtreeupdatenumber. Should be checked when the access tree cache has expired to avoid rebuilding the tree if there are no database changes.
        Returns:
        int

      • addReloadEvent

        void addReloadEvent​(AuthorizationCacheReloadListener listener)
        Adds a method to be triggered when the authorization cache should be reloaded. The event is called synchronously.

        This is a workaround until we can use JEE Events.

        Parameters:
        listener - listener

      • isNewAuthorizationPatternMarkerPresent

        boolean isNewAuthorizationPatternMarkerPresent()
        Returns:
        true after EJBCA 6.8.0 post upgrade has completed where we now combine multiple matched roles' access rules

      • setNewAuthorizationPatternMarker

        void setNewAuthorizationPatternMarker()
        See Also:
        isNewAuthorizationPatternMarkerPresent()
